load_jquery.label: Load jQuery
load_jquery.comment: Select 'Yes' if your theme doesn't use jQuery

default.label: Add return labels by default
default.comment: For bulk label creation: enable if available

stock_only.label: Enable Time Windows for products in stock only

show_days_forward.label: Show x days in forward (when available)

free_shipping_subtotal.label: Minimum Order Amount for Free Shipping
free_shipping_subtotal.comment: Use 0 to disable free shipping above

default_sod.label: Enable Signature on Delivery by default

default_no_neighbour.label: Enable "No neighbour" by default
default_no_neighbour.comment: This option enables no neighbour shipping option by default for door delivery while creating labels.

free_shipping_subtotal.label: Minimum Order Amount for Free Shipping
free_shipping_subtotal.comment: Use 0 to disable free shipping above

google_maps_api_key.label: Google Maps Javascript API Key
google_maps_api_key.comment: Please configure your credentials for Google Maps. No Google Maps Javascript API credentials yet? Follow the instructions at https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key

dhlparcel_shipping_option_SDD.label: DHLParcel - Shipping Option - Same Day Delivery

free_shipping_subtotal.label: Free shipping above
free_shipping_subtotal.comment: Use 0 to always let the customer pay this additional price for this shipping option

dhlparcel_shipping_option_NBB.label: DHLParcel - Shipping Option - No Neighbour Delivery

free_shipping_subtotal.label: Free shipping above
free_shipping_subtotal.comment: Use 0 to always let the customer pay this additional price for this shipping option

free_shipping_subtotal.label: Free shipping above
free_shipping_subtotal.comment: Use 0 to always let the customer pay this additional price for this shipping option

free_shipping_subtotal.label: Free shipping above
free_shipping_subtotal.comment: Use 0 to always let the customer pay this additional price for this shipping option

free_shipping_subtotal.label: Free shipping above
free_shipping_subtotal.comment: Use 0 to always let the customer pay this additional price for this shipping option

dhlparcel_shipping_option_BOUW.label: DHLParcel - Shipping Option - Delivery to construction site

free_shipping_subtotal.label: Free shipping above
free_shipping_subtotal.comment: Use 0 to always let the customer pay this additional price for this shipping option

dhlparcel_direct_print.label: DHLParcel - Direct Print
dhlparcel_direct_print.comment: This allows you to print directly from your webshop on a configured zebra printer using the 'DHLParcel Direct Printing service'
